step.cmd: Measurement accuracy is determined by the size of voxel (the pixel of the image recon-struction represents the size of voxel). For example, the accuracy of straight line mea-surement is 1 mm on the axis X, Y and Z for the image with scanning voxel of 1 mm×1 mm×1 mm. The accuracy of area measurement is 1 mm².
Measurement error does not exceed the actual area of the voxel corresponding to the half of voxel passed by the curve perimeter.
